The 'Eindhoven University of Technology' , abbr. '{{lang|nl|TU/e}}'.
is a university of technology located in Eindhoven, Netherlands. Its motto is
Mens agitat molem (The mind brings matter into motion). The university was the
second of its kind in the Netherlands, only Delft University of Technology
existed previously. Until mid-1980 it was known as the (abbr. ). In 2011 QS
World University Rankings placed Eindhoven at 146th internationally,
but 61st globally for Engineering & IT. Furthermore, in 2011 Academic Ranking of
World Universities (ARWU) rankings, TU/e
was placed at the 52-75 bucket internationally in Engineering/Technology and
Computer Science (ENG) category and at 34th place internationally in the
Computer Science subject field.
